article_title: 5 Reasons Why The Fed Should Have Raised Interest Rates

article_metadata.description: The Fed held interest rates constant at "near zero" yet again. The Fed seems fixated only on the bad things that might happen if rates are allowed to rise when they should be focused equally on all the economic benefits of higher interest rates.
article_metadata.author: Jeffrey Dorfman

og.description: The Fed held interest rates constant at "near zero" yet again. The Fed seems fixated only on the bad things that might happen if rates are allowed to rise when they should be focused equally on all the economic benefits of higher interest rates.
